info.author: EdouardBoute
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Mozilla Public License 2.0 (MPL 2.0)
info.name: pellipop
info.summary: A graphical and command-line tool to extract key frames from videos along with their retranscription. It uses the Whisper API to transcribe the audio. It also generates a CSV file with the extracted key frames and their corresponding text.
